summary: Adds a bunch of Windows cursors for personal use.
descriptionHtml:
I did not make them.I discovered them and thought, hmmm, the majority of Skyrim players probably haven't seen these. Redistributed with Creative Commons found in the license.

Unzip and paste into %windir%\Windows\Cursors
%windir% is the location of your Windows install, usually C:\ or D:\, depending upon whether or not you have multiple disks. These will only work on Windows unless you convert them to Mac or Linux.

To use the preset, you have to already move the files. Download the registry entry, and unzip it (7zip recommended). Double click on the .reg file, and click YES. Why is it a registry entry and not a preset file? Windows 7 doesn't create a file that contains a scheme: instead, it saves them to the "[i]Registry[/i]", a large database of settings and options you have saved over time. Just import the entry I created after you've moved the aforementioned files.

MORE MODS BY ME
